content: also available on the yarnspirations united kingdom 2 website no longer available in german on the yarnspirations united states site the pattern is written in us crochet terminology on the yarnspirations united kingdom site the pattern is written in uk crochet terminology a link is provided for a canadian website also 1 https //www yarnspirations com/red-heart-crochet-snowflake-garland/rhc0518-014736m html 2 https //www yarnspirations com/gb/red-heart-crochet-snowflake-garland/rhc0518-014736m html
